entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero except 6 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High zero except 6 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5 except minus 2 near the Alberta border. POP 30%
